C

CameraFragment - Class in edu.cnm.deepdive.picturequest
Fragment class that utilizes the Camera2 Api, lovingly borrowed from GoogleSampleCode.
CameraFragment() - Constructor for class edu.cnm.deepdive.picturequest.CameraFragment
 
CameraFragment.ConfirmationDialog - Class in edu.cnm.deepdive.picturequest
Shows OK/Cancel confirmation dialog about camera permission.
CameraFragment.ErrorDialog - Class in edu.cnm.deepdive.picturequest
Shows an error message dialog.
Choice - Class in edu.cnm.deepdive.picturequest.model.entity
This class is an Entity class for the RoomDatabase specifically for the avaiable choices for the 'choose' your own adventure game.
Choice() - Constructor for class edu.cnm.deepdive.picturequest.model.entity.Choice
 
ChoiceDao - Interface in edu.cnm.deepdive.picturequest.model.dao
Dao Interface used to interact with Choice, contains methods for Inserting, Finding by Id, as well as getting Relevant Choices to the specific scene and what inputs are given.
ChoiceFragment - Class in edu.cnm.deepdive.picturequest
Fragment class that is navigated to through the MainActivity the purpose of this Fragment is to display Buttons that have the associated Choice to continue the Story of the game then upon clicking a Button navigate you to the SceneFragment with the next Scene displayed.
ChoiceFragment() - Constructor for class edu.cnm.deepdive.picturequest.ChoiceFragment
 
ChoiceSynonym - Class in edu.cnm.deepdive.picturequest.model.entity
This class is an Entity class for the RoomDatabase specifically for helping ClarifaiTask find.
ChoiceSynonym() - Constructor for class edu.cnm.deepdive.picturequest.model.entity.ChoiceSynonym
 
ChoiceSynonymDao - Interface in edu.cnm.deepdive.picturequest.model.dao
Dao Interface designed to interact with ChoiceSynonym Entity class, including methods to insert and select all.
ChoiceViewModel - Class in edu.cnm.deepdive.picturequest.viewmodel
AndroidViewModel class for the ChoiceFragment to keep all database queries necessary for game play off of the UI thread.
ChoiceViewModel(Application) - Constructor for class edu.cnm.deepdive.picturequest.viewmodel.ChoiceViewModel
Constructor for the ChoiceViewModel initializes the instance.
ClarifaiTask - Class in edu.cnm.deepdive.picturequest.service
Class to make a call to the Clarifai API to create predictions off of an image, predicting what objects are contained within.
ClarifaiTask(Context, long, long) - Constructor for class edu.cnm.deepdive.picturequest.service.ClarifaiTask
Constructor for the class.
clearInputs(long, long) - Method in class edu.cnm.deepdive.picturequest.viewmodel.MainViewModel
Method to clear all Input for a specific Scene for a Player so that upon returning to a scene the Input will be cleared so the Choice will not be there already.
ConfirmationDialog() - Constructor for class edu.cnm.deepdive.picturequest.CameraFragment.ConfirmationDialog
